segments.text: I just want to shout at these people, to shake them out of their daze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring onto the floor; it's an absolute cascade!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone addressing this immediate danger?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman, she's standing in ankle-deep water, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me furious to see such a basic hazard ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they are going to seriously injure themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling, I can practically feel its instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's precarious reach into the cookie jar is just asking for a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as complicit, encouraging this dangerous act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is not just mischief; it's a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so frustrated, knowing what could happen at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They also need to get that boy off that stool before he gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me incredibly uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
